Regex
namespace Regex {...}
Types
FlagType
enum Regex::FlagType {...}

Regular expression flags. These can be bitwise OR'd together to combine options.

Values
icase

(256)

nosubs

(512)

optimize

(1024)

collate

(2048)

ECMAScript

(1)

basic

(2)

extended

(4)

awk

(8)

grep

(16)

egrep

(32)

MatchFlagType
enum Regex::MatchFlagType {...}

Match format flags. These can be bitwise OR'd together to combine options.

Values
match_default

(0)

match_not_bol

(1)

match_not_eol

(2)

match_not_bow

(4)

match_not_eow

(8)

match_any

(16)

match_not_null

(32)

match_continuous

(64)

match_prev_avail

(256)

format_default

(0)

format_sed

(1024)

format_no_copy

(2048)

format_first_only

(4096)

Functions
Match
bool Regex::Match(
const string& in szString,
const Regex@ pRegex,
MatchFlagType flags = match_default
)

Performs are regular expression matching operation.

Returns true if the match succeeded, false otherwise

Match
bool Regex::Match(
const string& in szString,
MatchResults@ pResults,
const Regex@ pRegex,
MatchFlagType flags = match_default
)

Performs are regular expression matching operation.

Returns true if the match succeeded, false otherwise.

pResults will contain the results of the operation, if any.

Replace
string Regex::Replace(
const string& in szString,
const Regex@ pRegex,
const string& in szFormat,
MatchFlagType flags = match_default
)

Makes a copy of the target sequence (the subject) with all matches of the regular expression pRegex (the pattern) replaced by szFormat (the replacement).

Search
bool Regex::Search(
const string& in szString,
const Regex@ pRegex,
MatchFlagType flags = match_default
)

Returns whether some sub-sequence in the target sequence (the subject) matches the regular expression pRegex.

Search
bool Regex::Search(
const string& in szString,
MatchResults@ pResults,
const Regex@ pRegex,
MatchFlagType flags = match_default
)

Returns whether some sub-sequence in the target sequence (the subject) matches the regular expression pRegex.

pResults will contain the results of the operation, if any.
